WorkItem.Description:
Has anyone running any app developed using this great library on Win 7? I am seeing ModernUI.App has stopped working error..

Works on Windows 8 :)

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Comments.Message: MUI works great on both Win7 and 8. Could the .NET45 framework be missing on your machine?
ModernUI.App runs on my Win7 64bits very well.

Thank you. It was not Win 7 - but the machine.config file. This article helped me to clear the error.

http://oszakiewski.net/eric/dbproviderfactories-section-can-only-appear-once-per-config-file

Thanks again.
I have the same problem, but it isn't the machine.config file. Any other suggestion?
When run on my pc there is no problem, but after publishing and trying to run it on another pc it just crashes.
I have the same problem as Ozomati, any ideas?
